text: Based on the results of CFD simulation , the infection risks of the occupants were investigated by using the dose - response model in the risk assessment [ 36 ] . The exposure levels of the passengers were assessed according to the concept of intake fraction [ 18 , 37 ] , which demonstrated the fraction of the quantity of pathogens deposited on the target infection site in the respiratory tract to the total quantity of pathogens produced by the index patient [ 38 ] :
